name: Sucrose
title: Knights of Favonius Alchemist
description: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

normalattack.name: Wind Spirit Creation
normalattack.description: Performs up to four Anemo DMG attacks. When charged, deals AoE Anemo DMG after a short casting time.

elementalskill.name: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308
elementalskill.description: A small Wind Spirit pulls in enemies, deals Anemo DMG in an AoE, and launches enemies. If it comes into contact with Hyrdo, Pyro, Cryo, or Electro elements it will deal additional DMG of that type.

elementalburst.name: Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 Type II
elementalburst.description: Hurls Large Wind Spirit onto the field to deal AoE Anemo DMG.

passivetalent1.name: Astable Invention
passivetalent1.description: There's a 10% chance Sucrose will receive twice the product when crafting Character and Weapon Enhancement Materials.

passivetalent2.name: Catalyst Conversion
passivetalent2.description: When Sucrose triggers a Swirl effect, any party members with a matching element increase in Elemental Mastery by 50 for 8s.

passivetalent3.name: Mollis Favonius
passivetalent3.description: When Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 or Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 Type II hit an enemy it increases other party members' Elemental Mastery based on 20% of Sucrose's Elemental Mastery for 8s.

constellations.d1: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 gains 1 additional charge.
constellations.d2: The duration of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II is increased by 2s.
constellations.d3:
Increases the Level of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d4: Every 7 Normal and Charged Attacks, Sucrose will reduce the CD of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 1-7s.
constellations.d5:
Increase the Level of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d6: If Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II triggers an Elemental Absorption, all party members gain a 20% Elemental DMG Bonus for the corresponding absorbed element during its duration.

profile.description: An alchemist with an insatiable curiosity towards the world and everything in it. Attached to the Knights of Favonius as an assistant to Albedo, her area of focus is "bio-alchemy."She strives to enrich the world by transforming living things with the power of alchemy.Granted, the products of her research sometimes prove to be more weird than wonderful — but on the whole, she has made monumental contributions to the field of bio-alchemy.

zhdescription: 对万物充满好奇的炼金术士，「生物炼金」学派的研究者。

zhnormalattack.name: 简式风灵作成
zhnormalattack.description:
普通攻击
进行至多四段的风灵攻击，造成风元素伤害。

重击
消耗一定体力，短暂咏唱后，造成风元素范围伤害。

zhelementalskill.name: 风灵作成·陆叁零捌
zhelementalskill.description: 召唤出小型风灵，对范围内敌人造成风元素伤害，牵引至风灵所在位置并击飞。

zhelementalburst.name: 禁·风灵作成·柒伍同构贰型
zhelementalburst.description:
砂糖抛出不稳定的烧瓶，生成大型风灵。
存在期间，大型风灵会持续牵引并击飞附近的敌人，造成风元素范围伤害。

元素转化
若风灵在技能持续期间接触了水元素/火元素/冰元素/雷元素，则会获得对应元素属性，额外造成该元素的附加伤害。
元素转化在技能持续期间仅会发生一次。

zhpassivetalent1.name: 触媒置换术
zhpassivetalent1.description: 砂糖触发扩散反应时，使对应元素类型的其他角色元素精通提升50，持续8秒。

zhpassivetalent2.name: 小小的慧风
zhpassivetalent2.description: 风灵作成·陆叁零捌或禁·风灵作成·染伍同构贰型命中敌人时，基于砂糖元素精通的20%,为其他角色提供元素精通加成，持续8秒。

zhpassivetalent3.name: 不稳定发现
zhpassivetalent3.description: 合成角色与武器培养素材时，有10%概率获得2倍产出。

zhconstellations.d1: 风灵作成·陆叁零捌的可使用次数增加1次。
zhconstellations.d2: 禁·风灵作成·柒伍同构贰型的技能持续时间延长2秒。
zhconstellations.d3: 风灵作成·陆叁零捌的技能等级提高3级。
zhconstellations.d4: 砂糖每进行7次普通攻击或者重击，风灵作成·陆叁零捌的冷却时间就会随机减少1-7秒。
zhconstellations.d5: 禁·风灵作成·柒伍同构贰型的技能等级提高3级。
zhconstellations.d6: 禁·风灵作成·柒伍同构贰型如果发生了元素转化，则使队伍中所有角色在技能持续时间内获得20%的对应元素伤害加成。
